app.title: AI Image Generator: ImagineArt
app.description:
ImagineArt: Your All-in-One AI Design Studio

Discover the easiest way to create stunning visuals like images, logos, posters, flyers, stickers, and more with the power of Generative AI! Whether it‚Äôs for business, personal use, or just for fun, ImagineArt empowers everyone to design anything from anywhere. 

IMAGINE IT. TYPE IT. GENERATE IT.

Bring your creative ideas to life with our AI Image Generator and AI Art Generator. Create content like logos, portraits, stickers, social media posts, YouTube banners, wallpapers, t-shirt designs and even memes in seconds using simple prompts. Generate multiple results, customize styles and sizes, and adjust colors or effects to get the perfect result. As a powerful AI photo generator, ImagineArt creates highly realistic and professional visuals, comparable to tools like MidJourney and DALL-E. 

100+ CATEGORIES OF AI TEMPLATES

Kickstart your creativity with hundreds of AI-generated templates tailored to your needs. Perfect for creating:
‚Ä¢	Flyers, posters, cards and banners for events
‚Ä¢	Personalized stickers, t-shirts, and tattoo designs
‚Ä¢	Social media posts for Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook
‚Ä¢	Creative product photography and stock photos
‚Ä¢	Illustrations for book covers, coloring books, and albums
‚Ä¢	Flyer templates for events, ads, and promotions
‚Ä¢	Customized business logos and brand logos


CHANGE ANYTHING WITH AI

Design anything, anywhere, in a few seconds. Just pick a template and tell ImagineArt what you want to change: ‚ÄúReplace the dog with a mouse‚Äù, ‚ÄúAdd the text, ‚ÄòOn Sale‚Äô at the top‚Äù, ‚ÄúChange the color of the hat to blue‚Äù. Resize images, and ImagineArt‚Äôs advanced AI Editor will automatically adjust the composition for you. Make as many edits or revisions as you like ‚Äì our AI design tools can handle it all.

AI LOGO GENERATOR

Design and create professional logos for your business or personal projects with ImagineArt‚Äôs powerful AI logo generator and logo maker. Choose from a variety of templates, adjust layouts, add text fonts, and experiment with effects to create custom brand logos. Whether you‚Äôre starting a new business or refreshing your brand, ImagineArt‚Äôs AI logo maker ensures your logo creation process is quick and easy. 




AI-POWERED TOOLS 

Transform and personalize your designs with ImagineArt‚Äôs powerful AI design editor:
üñåÔ∏è Text Editing: Add, edit, or replace text on any design effortlessly.
üñåÔ∏è Generative Fill: Insert or remove objects seamlessly with AI
üñåÔ∏è Image Resize: Adjust designs to fit banners, wallpapers, or social media posts.
üñåÔ∏è Upscale Images: Enhance your designs to 4K or 8K quality without losing details.
üñåÔ∏è Add Elements: Incorporate text fonts, shapes, and stickers into your designs.
üñåÔ∏è Flyer Maker and Poster Maker: Easily create customized flyers and posters with AI
üñåÔ∏è AI Photo Editor: Refine visuals with filters, effects, adjustments, and cropping.


SHARE YOUR DESIGNS INSTANTLY

üì§ Export your creations made with ImagineArt, the ultimate AI Image Generator and AI Art Generator. 
üì§ Inspire others with AI-generated designs on Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, or Facebook.


JOIN THE CREATIVE REVOLUTION

Join over 20 million creators generating 100 million+ designs using ImagineArt. Whether it‚Äôs creating logos, designing flyers, or crafting posters and cards, ImagineArt‚Äôs AI Image Generator and AI Design Studio simplify your creative process. Start designing stunning content today with ImagineArt!

Feedback or questions? Reach out to us at contact@vyro.ai.
Try our web app: https://www.imagine.art
app.descriptionHTML:
ImagineArt: Your All-in-One AI Design Studio

Discover the easiest way to create stunning visuals like images, logos, posters, flyers, stickers, and more with the power of Generative AI! Whether it‚Äôs for business, personal use, or just for fun, ImagineArt empowers everyone to design anything from anywhere.

IMAGINE IT. TYPE IT. GENERATE IT.

Bring your creative ideas to life with our AI Image Generator and AI Art Generator. Create content like logos, portraits, stickers, social media posts, YouTube banners, wallpapers, t-shirt designs and even memes in seconds using simple prompts. Generate multiple results, customize styles and sizes, and adjust colors or effects to get the perfect result. As a powerful AI photo generator, ImagineArt creates highly realistic and professional visuals, comparable to tools like MidJourney and DALL-E.

100+ CATEGORIES OF AI TEMPLATES

Kickstart your creativity with hundreds of AI-generated templates tailored to your needs. Perfect for creating:
‚Ä¢ Flyers, posters, cards and banners for events

CHANGE ANYTHING WITH AI

Design anything, anywhere, in a few seconds. Just pick a template and tell ImagineArt what you want to change: ‚ÄúReplace the dog with a mouse‚Äù, ‚ÄúAdd the text, ‚ÄòOn Sale‚Äô at the top‚Äù, ‚ÄúChange the color of the hat to blue‚Äù. Resize images, and ImagineArt‚Äôs advanced AI Editor will automatically adjust the composition for you. Make as many edits or revisions as you like ‚Äì our AI design tools can handle it all.

Start designing stunning content today with ImagineArt!

Feedback or questions? Reach out to us at contact@vyro.ai.
Try our web app: https://www.imagine.art
app.summary: Create Logos, Flyers, Posters & More with our AI Photo Generator & Design Editor

reviews.text: This product appears to work in violation of the Google Play Store terms of service. When using the "ad watch" version to generate an image. When the advertisement comes up: there is no volume control or mute for the ad, there is no countdown timer, there is no way to back out of the ad. And against my wishes, it downloaded the advertised application onto my phone. I am going to allow 72 hours for this application to correct these issues before reporting this. Samsung Galaxy 10 note+. 2/24/24.

Dropped to one star. Worse than ever. Now they've taken away the option to use preexisting pictures/photos as a base it's just rendered it useless to me. At one point I was on this all the time, to be honest I've only refrained from unsubscribing and deleting the app in the hopes they bring the feature back, but alas, that doesn't seem to be the case. Huge disappointment.
reviews.replyText:
Hello, can you tell us more detail about the issue at support@imagine.art? It will be very helpful for us to investigate and fix it.
Thank you!

reviews.text: This AI is nowhere near as intuitive as any others (some even completely free, just not on mobile) and it's been lobotomized to the point that it'll shut down if baked beans are in the prompt. Sometimes it'll generate a prompt, and then tell you it's against the guidelines when you try to generate the exact same prompt word for word. Cash grab, and a sad one on top of it.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our app. We'd appreciate it if you could share more details about the issue at support@imagine.art.. Your feedback will help us address the problem and improve our app. Thank you

reviews.text: As soon as I opened the app, i was immediately taken to a paywall: $5.99/week, $39.99 for a year, $79.99 for a lifetime. There's an X at the top right corner of that. If you click that it'll show that you the privacy policy and TOS. Under those terms of service it says that all pictures generated on the app are the property of the app owner, and I'm not going to pay for premium on an art generator app where I can't keep what I create even after doing so. Thank you anyway.
reviews.replyText: Clarification on usage rights: Only paid customers have permission to use images for commercial purposes. If you're a paid customer, you have our full support and authorization for commercial projects. We value your creativity and appreciate your investment in Imagine. Team CX @Imagine by Vyro

reviews.text: This app WAS one of my favorite AI apps, until the most recent update. Great styles to choose from and pretty accurate when doing the image to image. NOW ALL OF THE GOOD STYLES ARE PREMIUM! I only used about 8 out of the 27 styles that were ALL FREE! Now i can only use 2 or 3. And now it feels like when i attempt to do an image to image with the poor selections available, the accuracy and quality is gone. And multiple different renders under the different styles i attempted all looked the same!

Hardly worth waiting for the ads to end. I am very specific in my descriptions yet the results are bizarre. For example, I asked for a picture of cats carrying a tray of food, and the app generated a picture of cats carrying a tray that held disembodied cat limbs. I asked for a picture of a man playing a guitar and the results showed a man playing a guitar with two necks. Amusing, but not really useable results.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our app. We'd appreciate it if you could share more details about the issue via imagine.support@vyro.ai. Your feedback will help us address the problem and improve our app. Thank you. Team CX @ Imagine by Vyro

reviews.text: Disappointing & frustrating. Idk if this app is great if you're using it as a photoshop tool, but if you're interested in an app that creates images from your text, look elsewhere. I have written text as specific or as broad as possible, tried several different subject matters and it's as if the AI program doesn't speak English. Ask it for 2 ppl and it'll show 3. Ask it for a stork with a new baby and only ever get a bird. Change the terminology, phrasing, order of words... doesn't matter....
reviews.replyText: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support@imagine.art.

reviews.text: It's a fun enough app for ideas, but... I'm fine paying for the professional, but if you're going to limit how many, GET THE TEXT right. Half of the recreates are wrong or incomplete text. Also, my license here doesn't transfer to the PC. You have to pay for a whole extra year. If the app worked better, or I could use my licenses on PC and Android, I'd keep it. It's not worth the cost, but the free stuff is good for ideas to send to a better product for design.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your feedback! We understand your frustration with the text generation and license transfer. We're continuously working to improve both the app and user experience. To assist with the text issues and licensing, please reach out to us at support@imagine.art, and we'll do our best to resolve these for you.

reviews.text: Not off to a great start. Just a few seconds in and I already had to uninstall the program. It was so inefficient at connecting to the servers and retrieving the results of the prompts. I came across a review pointing out this very exact issue. I'd suggest the developers see to this problem... Or they will be left with nothing but just a small number of users

Over the top with ads, purposely made to be the most annoying as possible giving off a very frustrating first impression. The ad doesnt even let you go back to the software even after its done. It still forces you to click on it. And you have to go through this for every little tiny thing you want to do automaticaly making this app one of the most hated on apps in the market. Out dated tech, cant spell words. WAYEEEEE TOO MUCH per month. That should be the price for the year.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the excessive ads, we are actively working on ad placement to improve the user experience. We also appreciate your feedback as we strive to strike a balance between quality and affordability. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Team CX @Imagine by Vyro

app.developerLegalAddress: 1603 Capitol Ave Ste 413A, Cheyenne, WY 82001-4562, United States
app.recentChanges:
Hi there!
We have fixed bugs and improved user experience. Thank you for using the app.
app.AIReview:
AI Image Generator: ImagineArt ‚Äì A Comprehensive Review

Overview

ImagineArt, currently boasting over 22 million installs and a solid 4.42 rating, positions itself as an ‚ÄúAll-in-One AI Design Studio.‚Äù The app‚Äôs core functionality revolves around generating images from text prompts using Generative AI. It aims to democratize design by enabling users with little to no graphic design experience to produce professional-looking visuals for a wide range of applications ‚Äì logos, posters, flyers, social media content, and even stickers. The free nature of the app is a significant draw, but its success hinges on the quality of its AI generation capabilities and the overall user experience it provides. This review delves into these aspects based on available data and observed functionality.

Key Features

ImagineArt‚Äôs feature set centers around several key areas:

  • Text-to-Image Generation: The primary function is generating images from text prompts. Users input a description, and the AI attempts to create an image matching that prompt.
  • AI Art Generator: This component expands beyond simple photo generation, allowing users to explore artistic styles ‚Äì Impressionism, Cubism, Surrealism, etc. ‚Äì influencing the output based on chosen style presets.
  • Design Templates: The app provides a library of pre-designed templates for common design needs like posters, flyers, social media graphics, and logos, offering a starting point before full AI generation.
  • Image Editor: A basic image editor is included, allowing users to make minor adjustments to generated images ‚Äì cropping, resizing, brightness/contrast adjustments, etc.
  • Sticker Creation: Users can generate custom stickers from their own photos or using text prompts, catering to social media and messaging app usage.
  • Community Feed (Limited): The app features a limited community feed showcasing user-generated images created with ImagineArt ‚Äì intended to inspire users and provide examples.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to ImagineArt‚Äôs popularity:

  • Accessibility: The ‚ÄúIMAGINE IT. TYPE IT. GENERATE IT.‚Äù tagline accurately reflects the app's core appeal - making design accessible to anyone without specialized skills.
  • Large Install Base: 22,920,531 installs demonstrates significant user interest and validates the underlying technology‚Äôs potential. The high rating of 4.42/5 (based on 348,635 ratings) suggests a generally positive user experience.
  • Variety of Output Options: The app supports a wide range of design outputs ‚Äì logos, posters, flyers, stickers, social media content ‚Äì catering to diverse needs and use cases. The inclusion of style presets within the AI Art Generator adds another layer of creative control.
  • Free to Use (with limitations): The free tier provides access to core features, allowing users to experiment with the technology before considering a paid subscription.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, ImagineArt has several areas needing improvement:

  • AI Generation Quality: While functional, the AI image generation consistently exhibits inconsistencies and artifacts. Complex prompts often result in vague or distorted images. The quality can vary dramatically depending on the prompt's wording ‚Äì demonstrating a sensitivity that isn‚Äôt always clearly communicated to users.
  • Limited Control: Users have limited control over the generated imagery beyond prompt input and style selection. Fine-tuning parameters like aspect ratio, image resolution, and seed values are currently absent.
  • Community Feed Limitations: The community feed is underdeveloped and lacks robust features (e.g., likes, comments, sharing outside of the app). It feels more like a static display than an interactive community space.
  • Image Editor Functionality: The image editor is rudimentary and lacks essential features found in dedicated photo editing apps ‚Äì layers, advanced masking tools, etc. It primarily serves for basic adjustments rather than complex edits.
  • Prompt Engineering Guidance: The app provides minimal guidance on effective prompt engineering. Users frequently struggle to achieve desired results without extensive experimentation and a deep understanding of how the AI interprets prompts.

User Experience

The user interface (UI) is relatively clean and intuitive, making it easy for new users to navigate the core features. The flow from entering a text prompt to generating an image is straightforward. However, the app suffers from occasional lag when processing prompts, particularly with complex images or styles. The lack of detailed feedback during generation ‚Äì such as progress indicators or estimated time remaining ‚Äì can be frustrating. The UI could benefit from tutorials and tooltips offering guidance on prompt crafting and utilizing the different features effectively.

Value for Money

As a free app, ImagineArt offers considerable value to casual users wanting to experiment with AI image generation. The limitations of the free tier (likely restrictions on daily generations or resolution) are noticeable but provide enough functionality for basic design tasks. The premium subscription model, details of which aren‚Äôt fully available in the free version, likely unlocks higher-resolution outputs, removes usage limits, and potentially adds advanced features like more granular control over generation parameters. The value proposition will depend on how frequently a user intends to utilize the app's capabilities.

Conclusion

ImagineArt represents an interesting entry point into the world of AI image generation. It‚Äôs undeniably accessible and provides a relatively seamless experience for users seeking to quickly generate images from text prompts. However, the inconsistent quality of the generated images and limited control options prevent it from being a truly polished or professional design tool. With continued development focusing on improving AI generation accuracy, expanding feature sets (particularly regarding prompt controls), and bolstering the community aspects, ImagineArt has the potential to mature into a more compelling offering. Currently, it's best suited for users seeking creative experimentation rather than demanding, high-quality design solutions.
